## SOATuple type

Mapped type for index lookups. Declares an object with all keys from given `AttribSpecs` and each value a `Vec`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SOATuple<K extends string, V> = Record<K, V>;
```
